title: Gian
description: They say to stick to the monster you know. But Rhea Cabrera has spent her life living under her father's thumb and she’s ready toescape.  There’s no knight on a white horse, no prince charming coming to her rescue. Instead, it’s a mobster with dark eyes and a fitted suit. He offers her a deal too good to refuse.  This isn’t a love filled marriage.  There are no soft kisses and rose petals.This is an arrangement.  A trade from one monster to another.  And monsters?Well, they don’t get happy endings.
author: Natalia Lourose
